localize.text: But I think you and A might have become separate entities.
From the moment you started having new memories, you both began walking different paths.
I wonder how the memories separated you.
Well, even if you two have differences, it is still important for you to watch this place through A’s eyes.
Why do we repeat this eternal cycle, enduring endless suffering?
What's at the end of the line?
What kind of world was it that he saw? This is what you must know.
However, the choices you make are up to you, not him.
As a result, you may lose everything. Or, you may gain everything.
I'm not trying to control you. I'm just trying to support you, it’s my role.
Plus, I have seen many other Xs and witnessed their efforts and failure.
And you stepped on it all and climbed up.
Of course, I have kept all their data in my head, but it is not my place to mention it.
"A machine has its own work to do."
...Is what you or A once said to me.
